mapper.select: select q.id qid, qu.name qname, q.user_id quserId, q.title qtitle, q.content qcontent, q.created_at qtime, au.name aname, a.content acontent, a.created_at atime from question_tb q left join answer_tb a on q.id = a.question_id left join user_tb qu on q.user_id = qu.id left join user_tb au on a.user_id = au.id order by q.id desc limit ${limit} offset ${offset}

select q.id qid, qu.name qname, q.user_id quserId, q.title qtitle, q.content qcontent, q.created_at qtime, au.name aname, a.content acontent, a.created_at atime from question_tb q left join answer_tb a on q.id = a.question_id left join user_tb qu on q.user_id = qu.id left join user_tb au on a.user_id = au.id where q.id = #{id} order by q.id desc
select count(*) from question_tb q left join answer_tb a on q.id = a.question_id left join user_tb qu on q.user_id = qu.id left join user_tb au on a.user_id = au.id
mapper.insert: insert into answer_tb(question_id, user_id, content) values (#{questionId}, #{userId}, #{content})
